channel.title: Comments on: Simple Cucumber & Beef Stir Fry

item.title: By: Angie
item.dc:creator: Angie
item.description: Wonderful! Such a light and fresh dish!
item.content:encoded: Wonderful! Such a light and fresh dish!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/simple-cucumber-beef-stir-fry/#comment-428">Melissa</a>.
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. It made my day hearing that you enjoyed trying cooked cucumbers - they really are one of my favorites!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Melissa.

Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. It made my day hearing that you enjoyed trying cooked cucumbers – they really are one of my favorites!

item.title: By: Melissa
item.dc:creator: Melissa
item.description: This was delicious! I never would have thought to cook cucumbers!
item.content:encoded: This was delicious! I never would have thought to cook cucumbers!
